member.name: T:TSF.SearchCandidateProviderProfile
member.summary: Represents the identity of a Text Input Processor that is supposed to support ITfFnSearchCandidateProvider.

member.name: M:TSF.SearchCandidateProvider.GetThreadLocalInputSettings(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns if the IME settings is per-thread mode or not.
member.param: The value to be returned when fails to retrieve the settings.
member.returns: True if the IME settings is per-thread mode.
member.remarks: SearchCandidateProvider.FromProfile is available as long as the IME settings is per-thread mode.

member.name: M:TSF.SearchCandidateProvider.SetThreadLocalInputSettings(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the IME settings to be per-thread or not.
member.param: True if the IME settings should be set to per-thread mode.

member.name: M:TSF.SearchCandidateProvider.FromProfile(TSF.SearchCandidateProviderProfile)
member.remarks: The caller must ensure that the IME settings is kept to be per-thread mode from the method is called until the returned task is completed.
member.param: The profile information with which SearchCandidateProvider is instantiated.
member.returns: A task object which represents an asynchronous operation to initialize a SearchCandidateProvider object. The resolved value can be null if any error occurs.

member.name: M:TSF.SearchCandidateProvider.FromCurrentProfile
member.returns: A task object which represents an asynchronous operation to initialize a SearchCandidateProvider object. The resolved value can be null if any error occurs.

member.name: M:TSF.SearchCandidateProviderInternal.TSFEx.GetSearchCandidates(TSF.TypeLib.ITfFnSearchCandidateProvider,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: An iterator-based implementation that encapsulates COM reference counting operation around ITfFnSearchCandidateProvider.GetSearchCandidates.
